alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:27PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow increasing later this evening, then continuing through Sunday. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, be prepared for snowpacked and slick roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Chain and traction laws will possibly be enacted for the mountains. If traveling to the mountains, be prepared for winter driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
